body:
I cannot create pod. `kubectl describe pod` shows the following error

``` bash
 18m        2m      8   {kubelet rootfs-dev}    spec.containers{web}    Normal      Pulling     pulling image "kubernetes/pause"
  18m       2m      8   {kubelet rootfs-dev}    spec.containers{web}    Warning     Failed      Failed to pull image "kubernetes/pause": image pull failed for unknown error
  18m       2m      8   {kubelet rootfs-dev}                Warning     FailedSync  Error syncing pod, skipping: failed to "StartContainer" for "web" with ErrImagePull: "image pull failed for unknown error"

  18m   12s 73  {kubelet rootfs-dev}    spec.containers{web}    Normal  BackOff     Back-off pulling image "kubernetes/pause"
  18m   12s 73  {kubelet rootfs-dev}                Warning FailedSync  Error syncing pod, skipping: failed to "StartContainer" for "web" with ImagePullBackOff: "Back-off pulling image \"kubernetes/pause\""
```

`kubelet.log` shows the following message

``` text
I0816 20:28:50.953268   46840 kube_docker_client.go:298] Stop pulling image "kubernetes/pause:latest": ""
I0816 20:28:50.954275   46840 docker.go:196] Inspected image ("c80eebea8921a5e97f82fcf60da84f4de6399b9fc0ba683ceff67cd0dd319644") does not match kubernetes/pause:latest
E0816 20:28:50.954352   46840 docker_manager.go:2196] container start failed: ErrImagePull: image pull failed for unknown error
E0816 20:28:50.954462   46840 pod_workers.go:184] Error syncing pod b7f4fd2e-63ef-11e6-b8e8-000d3a12e034, skipping: failed to "StartContainer" for "web" with ErrImagePull: "image pull failed for unknown error"
I0816 20:28:50.954517   46840 server.go:679] Event(api.ObjectReference{Kind:"Pod", Namespace:"default", Name:"nfs-web-xs364", UID:"b7f4fd2e-63ef-11e6-b8e8-000d3a12e034", APIVersion:"v1", ResourceVersion:"577", FieldPath:"spec.containers{web}"}): type: 'Warning' reason: 'Failed' Failed to pull image "kubernetes/pause": image pull failed for unknown error
I0816 20:28:50.954547   46840 server.go:679] Event(api.ObjectReference{Kind:"Pod", Namespace:"default", Name:"nfs-web-xs364", UID:"b7f4fd2e-63ef-11e6-b8e8-000d3a12e034", APIVersion:"v1", ResourceVersion:"577", FieldPath:""}): type: 'Warning' reason: 'FailedSync' Error syncing pod, skipping: failed to "StartContainer" for "web" with ErrImagePull: "image pull failed for unknown error"
```

Tracing back to the source, the newly added image check function from 875fd16e1e1958b95ab96c4c9c9f672817bb9cfe prints the message

@kubernetes/sig-node @dims

title: failed to pull image
